abstract: Resentment and fear of Google’s power is growing among some of the biggest players in the advertising industry.
snippet: Resentment and fear of Google’s power is growing among some of the biggest players in the advertising industry.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department’s antitrust investigation of the advertising partnership between Google and Yahoo has revealed the growing resentment and fear of Google’s power among some of the biggest players in the advertising industry  the very customers that Google needs to keep expanding its business.

headline.main: Google Deal With Yahoo Draws More Opposition
headline.print_headline: Google Deal With Yahoo Draws More Opposition

abstract: Ask.com will unveil a revamped search engine Monday that digs deeper into the Web to answer certain kinds of queries.
snippet: Ask.com will unveil a revamped search engine Monday that digs deeper into the Web to answer certain kinds of queries.
lead_paragraph: Ask.com has a record of coming up with interesting innovations that are often copied by others in the Internet search business. Yet those innovations have done little to help the company expand its share of the search audience. Ask.com remains a distant fourth in a market that is overwhelmingly dominated by Google.

abstract: The Justice Department’s antitrust investigation of the advertising partnership between Google and Yahoo has revealed the growing resentment and fear of Google’s power among some of the biggest players in the advertising industry – the very customers that Google needs to keep expanding its business.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department’s antitrust investigation of the advertising partnership between Google and Yahoo has revealed the growing resentment and fear of Google’s power among some of the biggest players in the advertising industry – the very customers that Google needs to keep expanding its business.

abstract: Venture capitalists are optimists by nature. But these days, even the sunniest are having dark moments of the soul. But these days, even some of the sunniest venture investors are having dark moments of the soul.
snippet: Venture capitalists are optimists by nature. But these days, even the sunniest are having dark moments of the soul. But these days, even some of the sunniest venture investors are having dark moments of the soul.
lead_paragraph: VENTURE capitalists are optimists by nature. They bet on start-ups that are little more than ideas and hope they have found the next Google.
